If you need to cut a tile, you would first place the tile cutter on the tile with the blade facing downwards, then press down to cut along the line you've drawn. If you're cutting multiple tiles or large tiles, it's important to place the tile cutter on each tile in turn, then cut them one at a time. It's also helpful to have a flat surface to support the tile during cutting, like a table or another tile, and cutting in a controlled and steady motion.
